items.title: Sources: Nvidia plans to unveil a new AI inference chip at its GTC conference in March; the system will have a Groq-designed chip and OpenAI is a customer (Wall Street Journal)
items.title_en: Sources: Nvidia plans to unveil a new AI inference chip at its GTC conference in March; the system will have a Groq-designed chip and OpenAI is a customer (Wall Street Journal)
items.title_zh: 消息来源：Nvidia 计划在 3 月份的 GTC 大会上推出一款新的 AI 推理芯片；该系统将采用 Groq 设计的芯片，OpenAI 是其客户（华尔街日报）

items.title: Sam Altman says OpenAI reached an agreement with the DOD to deploy its models in DOD's classified network and asks DOD to extend those terms to all AI companies (Sam Altman/@sama)
items.title_en: Sam Altman says OpenAI reached an agreement with the DOD to deploy its models in DOD's classified network and asks DOD to extend those terms to all AI companies (Sam Altman/@sama)
items.title_zh: Sam Altman 表示 OpenAI 与国防部达成协议，在国防部的机密网络中部署其模型，并要求国防部将这些条款扩展到所有人工智能公司（Sam Altman/@sama）
